0.user_question: Mike was a pen pal with 5 people.  He stopped being penpals with 2 of them.  They each send 2 letters a week that are 5 pages long.  He responds in kind.  He can write a page every 6 minutes.  How many hours does he spend writing a week?

ost_step.1: Identify the initial number of letters Mike received from each pen pal. He received 2 x 5 = 10 letters from each of his 5 pen pals.
ost_step.2: Identify the final number of letters Mike receives from each pen pal. He receives 5 (initial number of pen pals) x 10 (number of letters each pen pal sends per week) = 50 letters per week.
ost_step.3: Calculate how many pages of letters Mike responds to. Mike responds to 10 x 2 = 20 letters per week.
